title: Herb&Fish CONNECT, an AquaHerb Garden Smartly Designed (Crowdfunding Campaign Launch on 9/3)
text:
Closer to nature; it can be a reality. Herb&Fish CONNECT brings nature to everyday life by combining plants and fish in a stylish and smart aqua herb garden. Imagine a decorative piece that recreates the natural ecological cycle with minimal maintenance in cleaning the fish bowl and watering the plant. And best of all, the process is made easy by seamlessly integrating with everyday smart phone devices. So let Herb&Fish CONNECT be a part of everyday life, and support Herb&Fish CONNECT's crowdfunding campaign on September 3rd, 2015.
Campaign Page: http://bit.ly/connect4u
The Design
Herb&Fish CONNECT has a harmonic and beautiful design of circles that represent the aquaponic cycle. It has an elegant round fish tank, arc-shaped lighting, round-shaped cover and disc-like touch sensor switch.
The Technology
Herb&Fish CONNECT is integrated with the everyday smartphone. It becomes a smart device by integrating with its intelligent LED lighting to make sure the plants get all the energy they need. The aquarium water pump can be set to run on a schedule and help monitor the water temperature, making sure the pet fish is comfortable.
The Convenience
The Herb&Fish CONNECT comes with an intuitive smartphone application. The app allows users to set personalize alarms to remind users when the pet fish needs to eat, when it is time to change the water, or when the temperature is too cold or too hot.
The City Garden
A big fan of organic food? Herb&Fish CONNECT can transform into a kitchen herb garden by growing aromatic and tasty herbs such as oregano, basil, peppermint, lavender and many others. So family and friends can enjoy some fresh and tasty herbs at the dinner table tonight.
